India Indonesia Philippines Singapore                                                             Capital Mobilisation - Internship (Across Asia)                                                              Internship                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               About AVPN                                                                                                    AVPN is a unique funders’ network committed to building a vibrant and high-impact social investment community across Asia. AVPN’s mission is to catalyse the movement toward a more strategic, collaborative, and outcome-focused approach to social investing, ensuring that resources are deployed as effectively as possible to address key social challenges facing Asia today and in the future.                                                                                                                                  Job Description                                                                                                    AVPN is hiring a  Capital Mobilisation Intern  to assist with managing the Deal Share Platform, Capacity Building programmes, and Philanthropic Funds. The intern will gain exposure to the growing social investment sector in Asia and the impactful work of the social organisations and AVPN members. Key responsibilities include supporting platform development, organising educational initiatives, managing philanthropic fund activities, and assisting with events focused on capital mobilisation efforts. Interns will report directly to the Senior Manager, Capital Mobilisation, and should be available for a period of 3-6 months starting immediately.                                                                                                                                  Responsibilities                                                                                                    As an intern, you will be responsible for supporting capacity building programmes and philanthropic fund management. Your tasks will include:                                              Organising capacity building activities:  Work with the team to plan and execute webinars, workshops, business clinics, and other educational programmes conducted by expert members for IOs.                                              Resource management:  Identify and nominate relevant IOs for member programmes for thematic philanthropic funds, grant funding opportunities, and non-financial resources. Additionally, support the team in managing resources for the Deal Share Platform, Development toolkit and other related platforms.                                              Communications and engagement:  Assist in developing strategic communication materials, such as blogs, external articles, and newsletters impact stories that come out of the philanthropic funds and capacity building pillars, engagement strategies, and social media content to showcase the work of IOs. Act as a key contact person for communication with these organisations.                                              Philanthropic Funds:  Support the team in identifying potential leads for funding, drafting concepts, identification of grantees, communication with the grantees, collecting data and feedback, and monitoring activities.                                              Data management and analysis:  Assist in analysing data related to programmes, platforms and philanthropic funds, and the effectiveness of various initiatives.                                              Event support:  Provide logistical support and session curation for AVPN's signature events, such as the AVPN Global Conference and Deal Share Live sessions.                                              Content creation:  Contribute to AVPN's blog posts, external articles, and newsletters, highlighting educational content, resources, and insights from the organisation's work with IOs, and members.                                                                                                                                                             Requirements                                                                                                                            Must be willing to learn and be open-minded                Must be able to take initiative                Be communicative                Able to collect, collate and present information perceptively                Be detailed, meticulous, and organised                Have firm MS Office skill                Strong written and spoken English                Candidate with experience/background in social entrepreneurship-related work is preferred                                                                                                                                               Application Process                                                                                                     Due to the high volume of applications, we will only notify candidates who have been shortlisted.

About our group:                     This position is part of Seagate Research Group (SRG). Seagate delivers advanced digital storage solutions to meet the needs of today’s consumers and tomorrow’s applications. Through technology, leadership and innovation, Seagate continues to help individuals and businesses maximize the potential of their digital content in an ever-evolving, on-demand world.                          About the role - you will:                           Work full time on projects at Pune in assisting Seagate Research Architect/leads in the area of most cutting-edge research in storage technologies        Responsible for investigating emerging technologies in storing data efficiently, which create data in new frontiers from AI/ML/mobility.        Potentially explore new mechanisms in electronic hardware modeling and prototyping in processing the data using upcoming technologies such as computational storage securely. Your work includes but would not be limited to, survey and process public and enterprise forums to help build models around these technologies, generate new ideas and conceptualize them and with the help of senior engineers in the team, contribute in the development of architecture towards building proofs of concepts.        Research/investigate emerging technologies in storage components and system, Data creation models and storage security        Document current and future storage architectures for different applications        Provide research intelligence for future Seagate products or create reference architectures        Work with subject matter experts at all Seagate (worldwide) sites        Create internal and external research papers and work with your affiliated school to bring academic research in these areas for applications in storage industry                                About you:                           Creative, independent and self-starter individual with excellent written and interpersonal communication who would be looking forward to work in corporate set up        Must be authorized to work in India while pursing education        Teamwork is a core competency at Seagate, individual must be able to work and communicate effectively with a diverse group of engineers        Must have demonstrated ability to study a functional area in depth        Ability to present to colleagues and partner                               Your experience includes:                           Working knowledge of Unix-based and Windows Operating Systems        Graduate School Research level experience with innovative techniques in AI/ML as well as Exposure to storage domain and FPGA based systems are added plus                               Location:                     Pune, India       Our site in Pune is dynamic, both in our cutting-edge, innovative work, as well as our vibrant on-site food, and athletic and personal development opportunities for our 400+ employees. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner from one of four cafeterias in the park. Take a break from your workday and participate in one of our many walkathons or compete against your colleagues in carrom, chess and table tennis. Learn about a technical topic outside your area of expertise at one of our monthly Technical Speaker Series, or attend one of the frequent on-site cultural festivals, celebrations, and community volunteer opportunities.               Location : Pune, India   Travel : None

We envision that a vast majority of the county's population will get better access to high-quality healthcare through their employers. We are a tech-first company and believe that technology can make this vision a reality by offering a 10x better experience and fixing the broken processes for all stakeholders - Employees, Employers, HR admins, Insurers, and Healthcare providers.                At Nova, we're looking to create and own the employee wellness category. In a short span of 15 months, we've built an outstanding team, achieved product-market fit, raised double-digit millions in funding and become the first company to secure an IRDAI Insurance broking license. The difference? We see ourselves in the business of improving employee happiness instead of insurance and as such more an HR tech company. Nova Benefits has been co-founded by Yash Gupta (IIT Delhi - Comp Sci, Samsung Korea) and Saransh Garg (IIT Bombay, BCG, Accel, Y-Combinator). We are backed by the top venture funds in the country - BVP, SIG, Better Capital, Titan Capital and Multiply Ventures.                   Key Responsibilities              Reach out to leads (HR leaders, Finance leaders, Founders) to convey Nova’s value proposition        Convert qualified leads into scheduled product demos with your Business Development Lead        Collaborate with team members to share and learn from best practices             Why you should join us              #1 Flat hierarchy  We are only merit oriented and don't care about your age, gender or background                 #2 High performance work culture  We will ensure this role is career defining for you You will be working in an elite team of hand-picked individuals                 #3 Balanced work-life  You can work remotely (Our company is based in Bangalore otherwise) Sundays are a complete off. Saturdays we work at our own time. We crush Monday-Fridays but only between 9 - 9. Our #1 value is Health (of our employees) and #7 is Success                 Job Requirement                What are we looking for ?              We are looking for a startup enthusiast - someone who loves knowing about the latest trends in the startup ecosystem        Loves being on top of whatever exciting is happening in the startup ecosystem        You’ve done some selling in the past and have the ability and desire to become great at sales        Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English        You have the "Hunger" to achieve and you find motivation in temporary setbacks        You don’t believe in settling, you find ways to overachieve and keep improving        Your ability to learn is off the charts        You love connecting with people online, on the phone, and face-to-face                 Nova Benefits is an equal-employment opportunity space that consciously hires people from diverse backgrounds. We thrive in the crux of psychological safety at the workspace and are committed to sustaining an inclusive, healthy and happy environment at work. We strongly encourage you to apply in case you are a cis-woman, a person of non-binary gender and sexual orientation, a person with a disability or represent any marginalized community.

Job Posting for Subtitle Writer (INTERN)   Passionate about writing and have a strong command over Hindi and English (Preferably a very STRONG command over English)? Are you skilled in translating content into accurate and engaging subtitles? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!   Stereo Tales is a leading provider of content localization services for filmmaker, OTT platforms working on movies, documentaries, digital video content and more.   We are currently seeking a talented and reliable Subtitle Writer to join our team. As a Subtitle Writer, you will be responsible for:   · Translating English or Hindi content into accurate and culturally appropriate subtitles.   · Creating engaging and error-free subtitles that convey the essence and meaning of the original content.   · Proofread and edit existing subtitles for accuracy and readability.   · Collaborate with our team to ensure adherence to project timelines and quality standards.   · Conducting research to ensure accurate translation and cultural relevance in subtitles.   · Staying updated with industry trends and best practices in subtitle creation.   · Adhering to the timelines given by clients.   · Willing to be available to write subtitles for assignments who come in last minute.   · Willing to travel to studios if required. (Necessary requirement)   Requirements:   · Native-level fluency in Hindi, with a strong grasp of grammar, vocabulary, and idiomatic expressions.   · Excellent command of written English to accurately translate content.   · Previous experience in subtitle writing or translation is a bonus.   · Exceptional language-proficiency candidates will be given the opportunity to learn the software and the subtitling processes.   · Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work consistently.   · Attention to detail and excellent proofreading and editing skills.   · Strong communication and collaboration skills.   · Passion for movies, documentaries, and OTT content.   · Resident of Mumbai and willing to travel to studios when necessary.   How to Apply:   If you meet the above requirements and are interested in joining our team as a INTERN Subtitle Writer, please submit the following to: creators@stereotales.com   · Updated resume highlighting your relevant experience.   · Samples of your previous subtitle work, if available.   · A brief introduction or cover letter explaining your interest in the position and why you would be a great fit for our team.   Join our dynamic and talented team, and contribute to making high-quality content accessible to a wider audience. Apply now and be part of our growing success in the entertainment industry!   Job Types: Internship, Freelance Contract length: 3 months   Pay: From ₹5,000.00 per month   Benefits:      Work from home     Experience:      total work: 2 years (Preferred)     Work Location: In person

You will assist the franchise business consulting team and will need to be great at these 5 things to apply for this role:          Make great presentations and create business pitch decks. You will be creating franchise investor presentations.      Should be from a commerce background and should have a fair understanding of creating financials/ ROI / as you will be involved in franchise financial business modeling.      Impeccable spoken and written English skills. We will not approve you if you are not 8/10 in your English and Interpersonal skills.      Willing to work from our Race Course Road Office in Bangalore for 6 Days a week from Monday-Saturday - Full time      The Initial Stipend will be ₹5000 Per Month and you should be willing to be absorbed as a Business Analyst Executive after completion of the Initial 6 Months Internship Period.         If you tick the above 5 boxes, then read the full JD:          If you are seeking a business consulting career, have a great command of written English, have a strategic mind-set and have a good flair for understanding different businesses, industries, and segments, and have done a lot of presentations, pitch decks, reports and articles in your MBA, then this job opening at our Bangalore HO is just for you:         We have a couple of openings that may match your profile:          Franchise Consultant / Business Consultant Interns: MBA's with Flair for Strategy & Entrepreneurship      Market Research Intern - Market Research, Report writing, excellent command of written English, and preferably from a commerce background with a sound understanding of different businesses.      Operations Consultant Interns. Flair for Documentation / Operations/ Creating SOPs/Building Operating Manuals.         This above internship, depending upon your strengths, could be merged into strategic roles as well and will involve working with senior consultants in creating franchise business models, financials, and franchise offering documents.       Preference:          MBA with a BCOM / BBA/ Commerce Background will be preferred over Engineering / Science / Arts Candidates. However, if you have a flair for business strategy and believe you could be very good at creating franchise business models and dabbling with financial models and pitch decks and have a very good flair in English & and strong Content Skills then you could apply.      You must be Well Settled in Bangalore or Ready to Relocate and join us immediately to assist the principal consultant on franchise development projects and stay preferably within 30 Minutes of Race Course Road.         Responsibilities include:       The Role of the Franchise Business Consultant / Business Research Analyst / Franchise Development Analyst /Growth Analyst / Market Research Associate / Interns is to assist the Senior consultants who perform the following functions:          Work with Clients in analysing their franchise and/or business systems and make recommendations related to business expansion and other issues including financial modelling.      Report Writing including Analysing and generating reports in the domain of retail, franchising, small & and medium businesses, market analyses, feasibility studies, business plans, and franchise structure outlines for franchisor clients for clients seeking to become franchisors. Assist Operations & and strategy consultants with the preparation of franchise marketing kits, various reports, and operations manuals for the overall functioning of franchisee business of various industry segments      Conduct secondary research based on the information needs of the client      Produce financial data, projecting cash flow performance of proposed franchise systems to develop and support recommendations in studies and other documents or as an end-project in and of itself.      Write proposals, meet with prospective clients, and work closely with the sales teams on their documentation requirements.      Develop clients, lead break-out meetings, and assist clients in structuring the franchise program.      Effectively perform discovery day programs whereby explaining the benefits of the strategic planning process to prospective clients.      Obtain market information for the organization and clients.      Independently manage ongoing client relationships and deliverables.         Ideal Candidate:      A relevant university degree and long term goal of taking up business consultants/analyst role/ market research/ growth analyst/report writing preferably from a commerce background. Science / Engineering background candidates may have difficulty performing financial analysis-related functions. We do not approve IT/ITES Based Analysts Interns as this role is completely different.         Very good command of written English and excellent interpersonal communication      Macro understanding of several businesses and their potential and analytical skills. Exposure to the Retail, F&B, Education, or Services Industries for Business Strategy will be an advantage for reporting and analysis.      Having done report writing for the industry, creating white papers and presentations will be an add-on.      Ability to work with owners/ senior management/collaborative mind-set      Analysis and problem-solving.      Ability to think out of the box.      Individuals must be process-oriented      Demonstrated knowledge of business laws and procedures (preferred)      Exceptional verbal, written, and presentation skills, including the ability to prepare and present to executives and potential franchisees – individually and in group formats - information and materials using MS Office, Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word, and other PC programs      Should be able to create financial documents related to business expansion, ROI, Etc. Very good at Excel.      Should be able to create great presentations (PPT) that could be presented to clients demonstrating the encapsulated strategy or work.        Must be WELL SETTLED IN BANGALORE AND HAVE LONG-TERM CONSULTING CAREER OBJECTIVES.      Starting Stipend- RS 5000 Per Month Nett Take Home For First Six Months.       If you match the above JD, please write a detailed email on why you think this role is just perfect for your profile along with your standard CV to human.resources@franchisebazar.com and if your email catches our attention and you fit our requirements, we will call you for a nice little chat on our future together.

Job Description:    We are a fast-growing online mental health counseling startup seeking a dynamic and creative Social Media Intern to join our team. As a Social Media Intern, you will play a crucial role in helping us establish a strong presence on various social media platforms and engage with our audience effectively. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone passionate about mental health and digital marketing to make a positive impact on people's lives while gaining hands-on experience in the field. Location: Remote    Responsibilities:    Content Creation:      Develop engaging and relevant content for our social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and other social networks in India.    Craft compelling audio, visual and written content that aligns with our brand message and appeals to our target audience.    Collaborate with our mental health experts to ensure content accuracy and sensitivity.     Social Media Management:      Schedule and publish posts regularly across all social media channels to maintain a consistent online presence.    Monitor and moderate user-generated content, comments, and messages to foster a positive and respectful community.     Audience Engagement:      Respond to comments, messages, and inquiries promptly and professionally.    Foster meaningful interactions with our followers to build brand loyalty and trust.    Stay up-to-date with industry trends and hot topics to initiate relevant conversations.     Social Media Analytics:      Track, analyze, and report on key performance metrics, such as engagement, reach, and conversion rates.    Use data insights to optimize content strategies and improve overall social media performance.     Campaigns and Promotions:      Assist in planning and executing social media campaigns and promotions to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our platform.     Research and Trend Analysis:      Stay informed about the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices.    Research competitor strategies to identify areas of opportunity and improvement.    Document the same regularly and track the progress      Requirements:       Current enrollment or recent graduation from a relevant field (e.g., Marketing, Communications, Psychology, or related).    Strong passion for mental health advocacy and de-stigmatization.    Excellent written and verbal communication skills.    Proficient in using social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok.    Basic knowledge of social media analytics and insights.    Creative mindset and ability to think outside the box.    Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.    Ability to work independently and as part of a team.    Empathetic and compassionate approach to online interactions.      Preferred:       Experience in social media management or content creation.    Familiarity with mental health-related content or counseling concepts.    Graphic design or video editing skills and accessibility to relevant software    Previous experience with social media scheduling tools.     If you are passionate about using social media to drive positive change in the mental health landscape, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our dedicated team. To apply, please submit your resume, a cover letter explaining your interest in the position and your approach to mental health advocacy on social media. Please complete your application before June 20, 2024.     Our Summer Internships start in May/June 2025 and are 10-12 weeks in duration.             This internship is intended for students who are pursuing a Bachelor's, Master's or Dual degree program in Computer Science or a related field.          To start the application process, you will need an updated CV or resume and a current unofficial or official transcript in English. Click on the 'Apply' button on this page and provide the required materials in the appropriate sections (PDFs preferred):           In the 'Resume Section' attach an updated CV or resume.       In the 'Education Section' attach a current or recent unofficial or official transcript in English.             Under 'Degree Status,' select 'Now attending' to upload a transcript.                 Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following:  Bangalore, Karnataka, India; Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Pune, Maharashtra, India .     Minimum qualifications:          Currently pursuing a Bachelor's, Master's or PhD degree in Computer Science or related technical field.        Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, Python, JavaScript, Go, etc.).        Experience working in Unix/Linux environments.        Experience with data structures, algorithms, and software design.             Preferred qualifications:          Currently in your penultimate year of study        Ability to work on projects related to mobile development, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, information retrieval, natural language processing, networking, developing large software systems, or security software development.        Ability to showcase tech projects and participate in computer science-related extracurricular activities.               About the job       Join us for a 10-12 week paid internship that offers personal and professional development, and community-building. The Software Engineering Internship program will give you an opportunity to work on computer science solutions, develop scalable, distributed software systems, and also collaborate on multitudes of smaller projects that have universal appeal.                Our engineers create, fix, extend, and scale code to keep it working against all the bad actors of the internet. You will work on software development projects to keep important business-critical systems up and running, from code-level troubleshooting of traffic anomalies to maintenance of services and monitoring/alerts to building automation infrastructure.              Google is and always will be an engineering company. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to address some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on millions, if not billions, of users. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on massive scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, Social to Local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another.             Responsibilities            Research, create, and develop software applications to extend and improve on Google's product offering.         Contribute to a wide variety of projects utilizing natural language processing, artificial intelligence, data compression, machine learning, and search technologies.         Collaborate on scalability issues involving access to large amounts of data and information.         Work and support a productive and innovative team with peers, managers, and cross-functional teams.           Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form.

Job Description: Job Title: Social Media Intern    Job Description:   We are seeking a motivated and creative Social Media Intern to join our team. As a Social Media Intern, you will play a key role in managing our social media presence across various platforms. You will be responsible for creating engaging content, analyzing performance metrics, and implementing strategies to drive growth and engagement.   Responsibilities:   1. Manage and update social media accounts (including but not limited to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn) with relevant content.   2. Create compelling and shareable content (text, image, video) tailored to each platform and target audience.   3. Monitor social media channels for mentions, comments, and messages, and respond in a timely manner.   4. Conduct regular analysis of social media performance using analytics tools to track key metrics and insights.   5. Develop and implement strategies to increase follower count, engagement, and overall brand awareness.   6. Stay up-to-date with social media trends, tools, and best practices, and propose innovative ideas to enhance our social media presence.   7. Collaborate with other team members to ensure consistency in brand messaging and content across all channels.   8. Assist in creating and executing social media campaigns and contests to promote brand initiatives and products/services.   9. Provide regular reports and updates on social media performance and progress towards goals.   10. Assist with other marketing and administrative tasks as needed.   Qualifications:   - Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s degree program in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.   - Strong understanding of social media platforms and their respective audiences.   - Excellent written and verbal communication skills.   - Creative thinker with the ability to generate engaging content.   - Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.   - Proficiency in social media management tools and analytics platforms.   - Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.   - Previous experience in social media management or digital marketing is a plus.   This internship offers valuable hands-on experience in social media management and digital marketing, with opportunities for learning and professional growth.   If you are passionate about social media and eager to make an impact, we encourage you to apply! Summary    Job Family Group Description - Communication & Marketing:    Gathers jobs relating to all areas of communication for every audience and channel. Conveys the image and identity of the brand.        Job Family Description -PR & Events:    Brings our luxury products onto the stage. Builds a solid reputation for our brands through event organisation, press relations and a robust online presence.        Sub-Job Family Description - Public Relations:    Builds and maintains our company reputation through public relations activities. Gives clear messages on our image internally and externally           Job Description          Role Mission          We are looking not only for dreamers, but for Dream-makers!          At Gucci you will be able to transform your dreams into something real, adding your contribution to the fashion world.          The role is designed for those who feel inspired by our company philosophy and aim to embody its essence. A great opportunity to contribute to the brand growth in a challenging yet joyful environment.              Your opportunity          As a PR Intern for GUCCI you get a wide exposure to the PR aspects of the luxury sphere. This position reports directly to the Senior Marketing & Communications Manager              How you will contribute              Sample Management           Responsible for the accurate and efficient stock control of all press samples including receipt of samples from Italy, samples on loan (merchandise going in and out for photo shoots/events), sample sales and write offs and stocktake.      Record sample stock deliveries in conjunction with the logistics & finance department; check off stock received against invoices, photograph each item to generate a sample record sheet for all press samples      Coordinate the dispatch and return of merchandise (store and showroom). Generate paper work, pack up and send out samples as required      Ensure all merchandise on loan is presented and packed to represent our brand values when sent out to press – attention to detail is key      Ensure all media requests are met and there is no loss or damage of merchandise      Ensure all merchandise is thoroughly checked off on its return, report any damaged or quality issues to the team      Regular follow-up and weekly tracking of on loan merchandise. Promptly report any missing samples or concerns for immediate follow up      Check availability and coordinate sample support for special events, editorial shoots and celebrity dressing.      Assist in the ongoing maintenance of the press rack (dry cleaning, alterations etc.)      Assist to ensure the sample closet is ALWAYS neat, tidy and in a presentable condition to reflect our prestigious brand values      Price check and product descriptions - carry out a final check to ensure that information is correct      Merchandise coordination in preparation for end of season press sample sales (process sales and generate the necessary paperwork).      Manage PR stockroom (e.g. press gift allocations, waiters uniforms etc)               Press Coverage – Brand & Competition           Tracking magazines, newspapers, websites and social media for Coverage on the brand and industry      Uploading them in an indexed format with PPT’s where needed      Keeping aside key magazines at the end of each month in our cupboards and removing old magazines      Tracking magazines, newspapers, websites and social media for Coverage on competitor brands      Tracking Competitor events and maintaining a document to be shared with the events team and for internal reference on a monthly or quarterly basis               Reports           Weekly ‘Work in Progress’ reports      Record keeping/filing of original set of clippings in case of any ad-hoc presentations, reporting needs      Daily filing of magazines, catalogues and library maintenance      Collate ad hoc reports when required      Direct Mail and Public Relation Tools      Place orders, check printing details and quantities of all DM tool (look books, mini folders.      Proactively monitor the DM calendar and record associated mail out (postage) costs to monitor spend against budget throughout the year      Coordinate master copies of each DM tool with merchandise availability comments for each store so they can adequately field customer enquiries      Coordinate mail outs; distribution lists (Media), print address labels, postage (check correct charges)      Collate feedback on DM tools for the international office      Monitor competitor DM activity and report back accordingly               Billing, Subscription & Stationery           Ensuring all bills are received on time and the magazine and newspaper bills correspond to the chart      Making copies of all bills received and handing over to Manager for approval      Maintaining & ordering Gucci and office stationery as required      Managing the office Gucci stationery and sending order forms to the international teams for anything we require including, Gucci thank you cards, envelopes, CD cases, CD Stickers and folders.               Other           Complete and/or perform any other reasonable duties assigned by your Manager or other managers as directed      Ensure teamwork and collaboration to deliver an exceptional client experience by all channels      Utilize all company tools including iPhone, iPad etc and company applications effectively, efficiently and as required by the business      Provide accurate daily and regular reports      All other ad hoc duties as required by your manager      Assist with logistics, gifting and back end support               Work experience           Previous internship experience in PR/ Communications/ Marketing preferably in the luxury environment      Detail oriented team player with the ability to work in a dynamic fast paced environment      Self-starter with excellent written and spoken communication skills      Organized with an ability to multi-task      Proficiency with MS Office (Excel, Powerpoint)      Bachelors/Masters degree in Fashion/Communications/Luxury Brand Management/Marketing preferred      Passionate about Luxury Fashion               Job Type    Trainee / Apprentice           Start Date    2024-02-15           Schedule    Full time           Organization    Luxury Goods Retail Pvt. REMOTE                    Customer Service                          India                               Who We Are       Sapaad PTE LTD is a multi-national SaaS product company operating for over a decade with Headquarters in Singapore, and offices in 5 countries. Sapaad’s flagship product serves customers in more than 40 countries. Sapaad fosters an organizational culture that prioritizes autonomy, excellence, and growth & innovation.      With a team of passionate developers and designers, Sapaad grows, innovates, and develops bleeding-edge features that revolutionize the industry. Headquartered in Singapore, with offices in Dubai and India, Sapaad’s key stakeholders and investors are technology veterans with years of experience in the web, mobility, and e-commerce world.       The Opportunity       As a Customer Solutions Engineer Intern, you’ll be the vital link between our valued customers and our cutting-edge products. You’ll delve into customer requirements and challenges, equipped with a deep understanding of our software offerings, to propose solutions through various communication channels, such as email, telephone, live chat, and in-person interactions.In this role, you will be the face of our product, an educator, and a customer advocate. You’ll have the chance to provide consultations, host webinars, and even create informative articles about product usage. As the initial point of contact for our products, you will be the “voice of the customer” within our organization, representing our solutions in the best possible way to build brand loyalty and customer retention.Key       Roles and Responsibilities            Develop a comprehensive understanding of Sapaad’s software products.       Engage with our users through phone and email to understand their issues and provide effective solutions.       Take ownership of user issues by raising tickets and coordinating with our engineering teams to provide detailed reports on issues and root causes.       Respond to user issues with clear, concise, and professional written language, maintaining grammatical correctness.       Participate in customer training and education programs to guide users on optimizing software usage.       Assist in onboarding and deploying the software at customer businesses.       Provide remote and on-site support as needed, escalating issues to the development team and ensuring their resolution.       Strive to make our users happy and transform them into brand ambassadors.           Skills and Qualifications            Preferably candidates who are graduating or have graduated with a degree in Engineering or Information Technology.       Proficient English communication skills, with knowledge of an additional language considered advantageous.       Proficiency in understanding technical terms with ease and the ability to explain them to non-technical users is essential.       Exceptional interpersonal abilities, as you’ll serve as the initial face of our company.       Persistence, patience, and empathy to effectively address user issues.       Commitment and accessibility, demonstrating a dedication to consistently being available for our users.

Job Description: JD for SOC Analyst:     What is a SOC analyst?    SOC analysts can be understood as the first point of contact to any incident/threat in basic terms. SOC stands for Security Operations Center, and it consists of multiple analysts who work 24x7 rotational shifts to fight against threats that could harm an organization. A SOC analyst generally is responsible for assessing the endpoints and look for vulnerabilities using various tools and technologies. However, the role of a SOC analyst is not limited to this:    SOC Analyst Job Duties and Responsibilities    Evaluate critical security incidents using detection tools. Investigate event alerts and logs from multiple endpoints. Analyze and co-relate logs from the firewall, IDS/IPS, AVs, O365, etc. Work in a 24x7 pro-active environment and respond to security alerts. Document and report incidents/offenses to the clients. Use Endpoint detection tools to detect malware across the client’s environment. Maintain and send monthly, weekly reports and other client-specific documentation. Work on industry standard SIEM solutions to analyze incidents and create complex indexed searches. Using analytical skills to whitelist False Positives incidents. Keep yourself updated on security news/vulnerabilities and compose a set of Use Cases. Use basic scripting knowledge to automate processes. Onboarding new clients from scratch and configuring their network environment. Identifying compromised Endpoints by analyzing payloads/logs and notifying clients. Work on latest security technologies, including Email filtering, Compliance and Patch management, Syslog management, MDR, and SIEM.    The internship's total duration will be six months. The candidate will be trained in Cybersecurity Operations by SafeAeon and will be paid a monthly stipend of INR 18,000/month. Upon completing the training, the trainees will be offered a TIER-1 SOC (Analyst) position in a company .   Interested candidates can share CV on ** shabnam@safeaeon.com **. Opportunity to get PPO                             About Peluche Inc        We have started Peluche on August’16 with an aim to create a leading Men Accessories Brand by 2020.                         ROI Driven:  We are a self-sustaining profitable fashion startup and thus whatever we do has to be ROI driven.                           Clientele:  Like any other business we have multiple revenue streams one of which is also B2B. We have been able to convert brands like Adidas, Suzuki, Archies, Organic India, Mahinda, ISS, Innovaccer, Terex, TVS, Wizcraft and many others. These brands not only help us stretch our boundaries but also contributes heavily on the revenue side.                           Consumer Love us:  Peluche is highest rated brand in its category on every Indian marketplace where we operate.                           Team:  Small and Nimble-footed team which gives us an edge over big corporates to get accustomed to ever-changing consumer demands.                           Location:  We are located at Soth Delhi with close proximity to popular areas                             Management Interns Job Profile        Selected interns will be given short-term projects in following fields based on company’s requirement and candidate’s skill set.                   Client Facing Roles                           B2B Sales:                                 Assist Sales Manager in closing deals with corporate brands. Do almost all the backend work to ensure that the Sales Managers spend maximum time in Client Meetings        Accompany Managers for meetings and if your manager is convinced you might get your own sales meeting.             Retail Expansions                      Assist the team in retail expansions        Meet and convince business owners of be-spoke men Apparel stores to keep Peluche products to maximize the profits.        This is going to be a difficult task as Peluche will work on a pre-paid model, unlike conventional brands. Here you will be competing directly with brands like Arrow, Van Heusen, Louis Phillipe etc.             Client Management                      Handle existing Indian and overseas brands to ensure customer delight.        Work with production team to maintain quality adherence and timely delivery.        Own the client and work a bridge with multiple departments.             Marketing Roles                       Partnerships                           Use existing contacts to partner with various brands for increased visibility. For example, partner with HDFC credit card to offer Peluche Cufflinks when a cardholder has the specified number of points on his card.             Client Engagement                      Device ways to engage existing B2C customers and maximize profits. Running referral programs, Driving engagement via Email or SMS.        Managing day-to-day customer queries and working with support functions to resolve the customer issues.             Content Marketing                      Writing live blogs        Creating useful content             Social Media Management                       If the profile interests you please let us know by sending your CV's at   hi@peluche.in   or   jatin@peluche.in

Job Description:              Drip Capital is a US-based trade finance firm leveraging technology to offer collateral-free working capital to SME exporters and importers. As a part of its marketing team, Drip Capital is looking for a prospect database intern. The individual will play a crucial role in lead generation and will learn the end-to-end prospecting and sales outreach processes of a B2B company.      As a prospect database intern, you will be responsible for researching potential clients and building a database of prospects. You will use various sources, including online databases, social media, and other resources, to gather information about potential customers. You will then organize this information in a systematic and detailed manner to create a comprehensive database that our sales team can use to contact potential clients.              Responsibilities:           Conduct research on potential customers using a variety of resources.         Compile and organize information on potential customers into a comprehensive database.         Update and maintain the prospect database regularly.         Ensure accuracy and completeness of the prospect database.         Provide reports and analysis on the database to the sales team as needed.         Support the sales team in identifying new business opportunities.                   Checklist:           Currently enrolled in a college/university program.         Strong research and analytical skills.         Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other database tools.         Detail-oriented and organized.         Strong communication and interpersonal skills.         Ability to work independently and as part of a team.         Experience with data management and SQL is a plus.                   This is an excellent opportunity for a fresher to gain experience in database management and research and all the marketing analytics that goes along with it. The Prospect Database Intern will be able to work closely with our sales team and gain valuable insights into the sales process. If you are an enthusiastic and motivated individual looking to gain valuable experience in a dynamic and growing company, we encourage you to apply.

You will assist the franchise business consulting team and will need to be great at these 5 things to apply for this role:          Make great presentations and create business pitch decks. You will be creating franchise investor presentations.      Should be from a commerce background and should have a fair understanding of creating financials/ ROI / as you will be involved in franchise financial business modeling.      Impeccable spoken and written English skills. We will not approve you if you are not 8/10 in your English and Interpersonal skills.      Willing to work from our Race Course Road Office in Bangalore for 6 Days a week from Monday-Saturday - Full time      The Initial Stipend will be ₹5000 Per Month and you should be willing to be absorbed as a Business Analyst Executive after completion of the Initial 6 Months Internship Period.         If you tick the above 5 boxes, then read the full JD:          If you are seeking a business consulting career, have a great command of written English, have a strategic mind-set and have a good flair for understanding different businesses, industries, and segments, and have done a lot of presentations, pitch decks, reports and articles in your MBA, then this job opening at our Bangalore HO is just for you:         We have a couple of openings that may match your profile:          Franchise Consultant / Business Consultant Interns: MBA's with Flair for Strategy & Entrepreneurship      Market Research Intern - Market Research, Report writing, excellent command of written English, and preferably from a commerce background with a sound understanding of different businesses.      Operations Consultant Interns. Flair for Documentation / Operations/ Creating SOPs/Building Operating Manuals.         This above internship, depending upon your strengths, could be merged into strategic roles as well and will involve working with senior consultants in creating franchise business models, financials, and franchise offering documents.       Preference:          MBA with a BCOM / BBA/ Commerce Background will be preferred over Engineering / Science / Arts Candidates. However, if you have a flair for business strategy and believe you could be very good at creating franchise business models and dabbling with financial models and pitch decks and have a very good flair in English & and strong Content Skills then you could apply.      You must be Well Settled in Bangalore or Ready to Relocate and join us immediately to assist the principal consultant on franchise development projects and stay preferably within 30 Minutes of Race Course Road.         Responsibilities include:       The Role of the Franchise Business Consultant / Business Research Analyst / Franchise Development Analyst /Growth Analyst / Market Research Associate / Interns is to assist the Senior consultants who perform the following functions:          Work with Clients in analysing their franchise and/or business systems and make recommendations related to business expansion and other issues including financial modelling.      Report Writing including Analysing and generating reports in the domain of retail, franchising, small & and medium businesses, market analyses, feasibility studies, business plans, and franchise structure outlines for franchisor clients for clients seeking to become franchisors. Assist Operations & and strategy consultants with the preparation of franchise marketing kits, various reports, and operations manuals for the overall functioning of franchisee business of various industry segments      Conduct secondary research based on the information needs of the client      Produce financial data, projecting cash flow performance of proposed franchise systems to develop and support recommendations in studies and other documents or as an end-project in and of itself.      Write proposals, meet with prospective clients, and work closely with the sales teams on their documentation requirements.      Develop clients, lead break-out meetings, and assist clients in structuring the franchise program.      Effectively perform discovery day programs whereby explaining the benefits of the strategic planning process to prospective clients.      Obtain market information for the organization and clients.      Independently manage ongoing client relationships and deliverables.         Ideal Candidate:      A relevant university degree and long term goal of taking up business consultants/analyst role/ market research/ growth analyst/report writing preferably from a commerce background. Science / Engineering background candidates may have difficulty performing financial analysis-related functions. We do not approve IT/ITES Based Analysts Interns as this role is completely different.         Very good command of written English and excellent interpersonal communication      Macro understanding of several businesses and their potential and analytical skills. Exposure to the Retail, F&B, Education, or Services Industries for Business Strategy will be an advantage for reporting and analysis.      Having done report writing for the industry, creating white papers and presentations will be an add-on.      Ability to work with owners/ senior management/collaborative mind-set      Analysis and problem-solving.      Ability to think out of the box.      Individuals must be process-oriented      Demonstrated knowledge of business laws and procedures (preferred)      Exceptional verbal, written, and presentation skills, including the ability to prepare and present to executives and potential franchisees – individually and in group formats - information and materials using MS Office, Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word, and other PC programs      Should be able to create financial documents related to business expansion, ROI, Etc. Very good at Excel.      Should be able to create great presentations (PPT) that could be presented to clients demonstrating the encapsulated strategy or work.        Must be WELL SETTLED IN BANGALORE AND HAVE LONG-TERM CONSULTING CAREER OBJECTIVES.      Starting Stipend- RS 5000 Per Month Nett Take Home For First Six Months.       If you match the above JD, please write a detailed email on why you think this role is just perfect for your profile along with your standard CV to human.resources@franchisebazar.com and if your email catches our attention and you fit our requirements, we will call you for a nice little chat on our future together.

Company Description      VIFX Design Studio Pvt Ltd (VIFX) offers post-production visual effects (VFX) related services like VFX, CGI, 2D / 3D visual art services including, but not limited to, modeling, compositing, motion capture, color corrections, matte painting, concept design, 3D effects, rotoscoping, and tracking in India by utilising the most cutting-edge digital solution-based technologies.     The Pitch Black Company is a global house of award-winning creative brands with a rich history in digital production for film, television and streaming media. ROI Driven:  We are a self-sustaining profitable fashion startup and thus whatever we do has to be ROI driven.                           Clientele:  Like any other business we have multiple revenue streams one of which is also B2B. We have been able to convert brands like Adidas, Suzuki, Archies, Organic India, Mahinda, ISS, Innovaccer, Terex, TVS, Wizcraft and many others. These brands not only help us stretch our boundaries but also contributes heavily on the revenue side. Client Facing Roles                           B2B Sales:                                 Assist Sales Manager in closing deals with corporate brands. Marketing Roles                       Partnerships                           Use existing contacts to partner with various brands for increased visibility. For example, partner with HDFC credit card to offer Peluche Cufflinks when a cardholder has the specified number of points on his card.             Client Engagement                      Device ways to engage existing B2C customers and maximize profits. Running referral programs, Driving engagement via Email or SMS.        Managing day-to-day customer queries and working with support functions to resolve the customer issues. Job Title: Indirect Tax VAT - Intern      At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.           Description      EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services. The insights and quality services we deliver help build trust and confidence in the capital markets and in economies the world over. We develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all our stakeholders. In so doing, we play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities. Visit us at www.     Our organization helps companies in business across all industries to identify and capitalize on business opportunities. As a leading professional service organization, EY is present in 140 countries worldwide and employs over 160,000 people. We offer our clients, which are small, medium-sized companies and international corporations, a broad array of services in audit, tax and advisory.     With this breadth of service offerings, you have the opportunity to develop your career through a variety of experiences, mentoring and formal learning to ensure our employee value proposition – Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime – is a reality.           Tasks & responsibilities:      As a Tax Intern in GDS Indirect Tax Center, you will be focused on preparation of projects/services in the domain of Indirect Tax/VAT. Your main responsibilities as an Tax/Advanced Tax Analyst are:         Prepare indirect tax returns and file (where applicable) these returns via the country specific filing tool - applicable to GDS only.      Demonstrate an understating of basic tax concepts and proactively increases tax knowledge through client assignments and current tax developments.      Multi - Task on various projects within the tax segment and be cross trained.      Proposing improvement possibilities to raise effectiveness and efficiency of the work processes.      Develop and deliver quality and timely services and work products efficiently.      Comply with Ernst & Young compliance procedure.              We are looking for candidates with the following background & basic Skills:          Graduate/Post graduates preferably in Commerce, preferably in an Accounting/Tax field.      Dynamic, innovative & problem resolution focus with good communication skills.      Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.      Demonstrate good computer knowledge - in MS Excel and a basic knowledge of other MS Office, Web-based applications.      Basic knowledge about functioning/usage of ERP-systems.            Individual showing great interest in working with multi-country clients.      Individual being capable of working Independently.      Team player - driving the team towards progression.              Offer          A competitive remuneration package where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance.      A comprehensive Total Rewards package includes support for flexible working and career development.      Option to select benefits that suit your needs, covering holidays, health and well-being, insurance, savings and a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions with FlexEY.      Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around.      Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career.      The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you.              EY | Building a better working world           EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.          Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.          Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

What’s Editorialist?                Editorialist melds personal styling, editorial content, and shopping into one seamless digital experience powered by proprietary technology and e-commerce tools. Editorialist.com, our media property, delivers sophisticated content and commerce to aspirational and affluent consumers. Our stories connect readers with bespoke product and service solutions for fashion, accessories, beauty, and wellness needs. The cornerstone of our tech platform—the YX app—blends content, digital services, and e-commerce for our elite clientele, individuals with an average net worth in excess of $550 million. Our co-founder and CEO Rafael Ortiz previously co-founded NexTag, the largest comparison shopping site for products and services, and was responsible for marketing and business development until its sale for $1.2 billion                Job synopsis:  We need a Catalog Analyst - Intern to help clean and manually curate our 1 million+ products and help with the feedback pipeline to improve machine learning algorithms.        Responsibilities          Manually review predictions of our machine learning models and provide feedback.      New Product addition to the catalog.      Merging of similar products from different retailers from the catalog.      Curating and tagging best-selling products based on current market trends involving style, color, print, pattern, and silhouettes      Correct the product descriptors, sub-categories, and subtypes.      Maintain categorization of the products.      Catalog sanitization of different categories and adding up new attributes for better visibility of the product.         Requirements          Bachelor’s degree (preferably related to fashion).      High Energy/Startup Mindset Willing to learn.      Past exposure to the US Fashion Market is a big plus.

Opportunity to get PPO                             About Peluche Inc        We have started Peluche on August’16 with an aim to create a leading Men Accessories Brand by 2020.                         ROI Driven:  We are a self-sustaining profitable fashion startup and thus whatever we do has to be ROI driven.                           Clientele:  Like any other business we have multiple revenue streams one of which is also B2B. We have been able to convert brands like Adidas, Suzuki, Archies, Organic India, Mahinda, ISS, Innovaccer, Terex, TVS, Wizcraft and many others. These brands not only help us stretch our boundaries but also contributes heavily on the revenue side.                           Consumer Love us:  Peluche is highest rated brand in its category on every Indian marketplace where we operate.                           Team:  Small and Nimble-footed team which gives us an edge over big corporates to get accustomed to ever-changing consumer demands.                           Location:  We are located at Soth Delhi with close proximity to popular areas                             Management Interns Job Profile        Selected interns will be given short-term projects in following fields based on company’s requirement and candidate’s skill set.                   Client Facing Roles                           B2B Sales:                                 Assist Sales Manager in closing deals with corporate brands. Do almost all the backend work to ensure that the Sales Managers spend maximum time in Client Meetings        Accompany Managers for meetings and if your manager is convinced you might get your own sales meeting.             Retail Expansions                      Assist the team in retail expansions        Meet and convince business owners of be-spoke men Apparel stores to keep Peluche products to maximize the profits.        This is going to be a difficult task as Peluche will work on a pre-paid model, unlike conventional brands. Here you will be competing directly with brands like Arrow, Van Heusen, Louis Phillipe etc.             Client Management                      Handle existing Indian and overseas brands to ensure customer delight.        Work with production team to maintain quality adherence and timely delivery.        Own the client and work a bridge with multiple departments.             Marketing Roles                       Partnerships                           Use existing contacts to partner with various brands for increased visibility. For example, partner with HDFC credit card to offer Peluche Cufflinks when a cardholder has the specified number of points on his card.             Client Engagement                      Device ways to engage existing B2C customers and maximize profits. Running referral programs, Driving engagement via Email or SMS.        Managing day-to-day customer queries and working with support functions to resolve the customer issues.             Content Marketing                      Writing live blogs        Creating useful content             Social Media Management                       If the profile interests you please let us know by sending your CV's at   hi@peluche.in   or   jatin@peluche.in

Position: Franchise Managers Jobs In India / Business Development Executives & Interns Careers
Job Description: Call +91 9844443277 or 080- 22267017 for more clarity on the above opening and to schedule your appointments now. Send in your CV to hr@franchisebazar.com before calling us.   Apply for the best franchise manager jobs in India. We have 2 positions open here for assistant managers and manager who have sold franchisees previously or appointed channel partners in their previous roles.      Calling Franchise Sales Professionals / Franchise Development Manager / Business Development Manager for a fast-paced high growth franchising career at FranchiseBazar Bangalore Head Office. Franchise Development Jobs for Franchise Managers and Franchise Marketing, Franchise Sales executives.      This is purely for sales professionals who are confident of closing deals in the B2C space and have sold franchisees or appointed franchises, dealers, distributors, agents or channel partners or have been working with investors in their previous roles. Banking, Insurance, Real Estate & Event Sales professionals who have done channel development will be the second preference after franchise experienced professionals.      You will have to be an entrepreneur at heart, have great verbal presentation, strong track record of revenue generation, understand different types of businesses and have a consultative selling approach to sell / broker new opportunities to entrepreneurs looking at starting a new business.       This will be your role:     Franchise Development For Key Accounts:  You will be the franchise development manager for multiple brands that we work closely with and will be in charge of recruiting franchises for these brands as per their specific requirements. You will strategize each client’s expansion plan to recruit franchisees for them and work closely with our Digital Marketing Teams to get your brands the desired leads and results after they come on board with us using our platforms and offer franchisee onboarding solutions to clients seeking business expansion and ensure that you achieve customer satisfaction as per FranchiseBazar corporate guidelines.   Entrepreneur New Business Consultant – You will have to be proficient in working with investors and prospective business seekers and work with entrepreneurs who register on FranchiseBazar as their personalized coach and assist them in identifying the brands that could match their requirements and help them buy a business that matches their requirements. You will also work with Franchise Sales Interns / Executives who work with a large number of entrepreneurs and help them to filter the right entrepreneurs from the franchise leads they manage.    Play the Match-Maker Broker Role:  Connect Triparty calls with Brands as per the requirements of Entrepreneurs who have registered with us and are seeking opportunities of their choice. You will have to be able to negotiate the terms and conditions of the franchise and enable the transaction, helping our teams to broker the deal.    CTC:  Starts at Rs 10L P.A for Assistant Managers & will vary as per your Experience & Seniority of Role and number of franchisees / channel partners already appointed.    +Incentives:  40% of the CTC is variable and is paid as Incentives.

Autofocus Marketing is a dynamic and innovative agency specializing in delivering cutting-edge marketing solutions for the automotive industry. We pride ourselves on our ability to create compelling content and strategies that drive engagement and conversions for our clients. If you have a passion for crafting engaging narratives and a keen eye for detail, join our creative team and help us accelerate our clients' success.    Job Description:  We are looking for a talented and versatile Copywriter to join our team at Autofocus Marketing. The ideal candidate will be a creative thinker with a knack for crafting compelling content across a variety of platforms. This role involves writing engaging copy for digital and print media, including websites, social media, email campaigns, advertisements, and more. As a key member of our marketing team, you will help shape our clients' brand voices and contribute to the development of impactful marketing campaigns.    Key Responsibilities:        Content Creation:     Write clear, compelling, and persuasive copy for a variety of media, including websites, social media, emails, blogs, brochures, and advertisements.    Develop content that aligns with our clients' brand voices and effectively communicates their key messages.    Collaborate with designers, marketers, and other team members to create integrated and cohesive marketing materials.     Campaign Development:     Work closely with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop creative concepts for marketing campaigns.    Craft compelling narratives and messages that drive engagement and conversions.    Develop taglines, slogans, and other branding elements that resonate with target audiences.     SEO and Digital Marketing:     Optimize copy for SEO to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.    Write content for landing pages, PPC ads, and other digital marketing initiatives.    Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO and digital marketing trends and best practices.     Editing and Proofreading:     Edit and proofread copy to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to brand guidelines.    Review and revise content to meet the highest standards of quality and effectiveness.     Research and Insights:     Conduct research to understand client industries, target audiences, and competitive landscapes.    Use insights to inform content strategy and create relevant, targeted copy.     Client Interaction:     Collaborate with clients to understand their needs, objectives, and preferences.    Present copy ideas and drafts to clients and incorporate feedback to refine content.      Requirements:       Bachelor’s degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.    Proven experience as a copywriter, preferably in an agency or marketing setting.    Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills.    Strong understanding of SEO principles and best practices.    Ability to write for diverse audiences and adapt tone and style accordingly.    Creative thinking and problem-solving skills.    Excellent time management and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.    Proficiency in Microsoft Office and familiarity with content management systems and digital marketing tools.    A portfolio showcasing a range of writing samples and successful projects.      Preferred Qualifications:       Experience in the electric vehicles, SAAS, or Hospitality Industry is an addon    Knowledge of social media platforms and digital marketing strategies.    Familiarity with graphic design principles and tools such as Adobe Creative Suite.      Benefits:       Competitive salary and benefits package.    Opportunity to work with a dynamic and talented team.    Professional development and training opportunities.    Creative and collaborative work environment.    Flexible working hours and potential for remote work. Internship Programme at AideExpert Advisory          Internship opportunities are open for MBA students from colleges in and around Pune. To qualify for any internship, students should demonstrate strong curiosity and a keen ability to learn new skills fast. They should be self motivated and be able to ask engaging business questions. Interns who participate and learn as part of consulting projects need to have the confidence and be comfortable to engage with AideExpert customers. Long term and short term internship opportunities are available.                                             Short Term Internships          Short term opportunities for internships are available as part of market research teams. Students will learn to research on specific business problems and competitive analysis based using secondary research techniques. Short term internships are from 4 to 6 weeks in duration. Short term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Short term internships and are not paid.                                       Long Term Internships          Long Term opportunities for internships are available as part of consulting/advisory team and market research team. Students will learn lean startup and business process analysis skills as part of advisory projects. Long term internships are from 2 months to 6 months duration. Long term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Long term interns may need to travel to customer locations. Flexibility in office timing is available during college examinations and other college activities. A fixed stipend per month will be paid for selected interns.                      All Intern positions are immediate requirement and are based in Pune. Shortlisted students will be interviewed before being selected for internships by AideExpert Advisory team.                                       Stipend:  5000/                       Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization                       Functional Area:  Marketing, Research, Analytics, Technology                       Role Category : Marketing Research                       Keyskills : Secondary research, analysis, report writing, Market Research                                                         Responsibilities                       1.Working with Senior advisors to create company and product competitive analysis reports         2. Content writing for website- consulting/advisory services         3. Report writing for consulting projects         4. Learn to research on specific business problems using secondary research techniques         5. Opportunity to participate in consulting/advisory projects at customer site based on performance

About ByteDance   Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.      Why Join Us   Creation is the core of ByteDance's purpose. Our products are built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make our innovations possible.   Together, we inspire creativity and enrich life - a mission we aim towards achieving every day.   To us, every challenge, no matter how ambiguous, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.   At ByteDance, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the users we serve.   Join us.      About Our Team   Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.      We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2024. Internships at ByteDance aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at ByteDance.      Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to ByteDance and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.       Responsibilities:    As our HR Intern, you can work with various areas of HR to support the following initiatives:         Assist with process documentation, project management, program coordination, on matters such as onboarding, employee engagement, employee development etc.     Understand the company HR policies, and provide support and answers to employees' queries.     Provide data analysis support on people-related matters.     Improve employee experience by organizing and promoting culture-related activities.     Research various HR topics and industry-leading practices.     Other duties as assigned.     1. Undergraduate who is currently pursuing a degree in human resources, marketing, mass communication or a related technical discipline from a reputable university.   2. Highly motivated, attention to details, Perform with minimal supervision.   3. Ability to work effectively in a complex/demanding environment.   4. Ability to multitask and work on multiple assignments simultaneously.   5. Strong interpersonal and communication skills.   6. Professional attitude and demeanor.      ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.      By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://jobs.bytedance.com/en/legal/privacy.      If you have any questions, please reach out to us at apac-earlycareers@bytedance.com
