VenueMonk is a technology-enabled event planning service. Presently, in India, finding and booking a venue for any event is a rather exaggerated process. A typical venue booking timeline lasts 3 to 15 days. It starts with an online search and is followed by calls to different venues, explaining your requirements to them, visiting them, negotiating with them, and would end with you booking your short-listed venue. Our aim is to fill in the obvious gap in the events industry, that is, finding information in one place and the ease of booking services at the best prices. You can explore over a thousand listed venues and vendors for planning your event. Not only do we provide detailed, comprehensive, and current information about the venues and vendors, we also help you book these services at the best price in a hassle-free way with just a click or a call. We are currently working with 1800+ venues across Delhi-NCR. About epiFi                             Who we are:             Simply put, a FinTech startup for digital natives. Our mission is to help our users demystify their finances, maximize their savings and spend intelligently. We are building a highly secure hub - a savings account that allows you to consolidate your finances in a single intuitive view.                   Who we are looking for:             Exceptional, innovative people! Passionate about delightful user experiences, clear about doing the right thing and hungry to impact millions of lives.                   Why you should work with us:             We are about doing the right thing always, both for our team and users. We are a positive, transparent and inclusive community celebrating success together, encouraging bias for action and individual brilliance. We are ambitious and want everyone thinking - impact and growth - Our office is not just fun, it is human, nimble and business-like.             With rich experience in the world's leading tech companies and banks, we deeply and equally understand both the fin and tech in fintech. Funded by leading global VCs, we are in pursuit of a fantastic experience for both our consumers and colleagues.                   What You Can Expect From This Role:             The minimum expected duration of internship will be 3-6 months with a 5 day work week.      A letter of recommendation towards the end of a successful internship.      Possibility of a full time role offer solely based on internship performance                    What this role is about :             We are looking for interns who possess a passion for pushing technology to the limits and finding creative solutions that make an impact for our users. As part of the product management team, you will work closely with user research and cross-functional teams to identify product insights, create the product vision, drive development and continuously iterate.                   What we look for:             Ability to work cross-functionally in a highly collaborative but fast, changing and ambiguous environment      Understanding of the consumer through research, and market data and with focus on the consumer during product development      Spark that separates you from the rest      Ability to think out of the box and on your feet      Passion for consumer-facing high-quality products.       Ability to understand and evaluate complex engineering systems and suggest creative solutions by collaborating closely with engineering      Exposure to product design with some experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows and process flows      Strong business acumen      Ability to combine power of analytics and heuristics with innovative customer validation techniques                    You should apply if:             You are a graduate in Engineering or a related subject              - You have some experience in product related internships like product design or product management, - or problem solving             You're passionate about building the best possible user experience       You have some exposure to Figma or Sketch and software development      You're passionate about sharing your knowledge and collaborating across teams      You are comfortable with ambiguity and have the skill to transform broad ideas into action plans      You have empathy towards users and colleagues, are creative and excited by ideating/ building      You seek high ownership, independent environments and feedback oriented cultures                    Selection Process : Once we receive your application, our talent team will review and reach out for a first round of discussion, followed by an assignment and 2-3 rounds of video interviews with the team & key stakeholders.             These rounds will assess your articulation & communication, general aptitude, attitude and a team fitment                   This is an in-office position. We are currently based out of Whitefield, Bangalore.

This HR recruiter internship seems like a great opportunity for individuals looking to gain hands-on experience in talent acquisition and human resources. Let's break down the responsibilities and benefits listed:    Job Role and Responsibilities:        Sourcing:  Utilizing various methods to attract candidates from diverse backgrounds.     Candidate Pipeline:  Building and maintaining a pool of potential candidates for current and future openings.     Screening:  Reviewing resumes and applications to match candidates with job requirements.     Interviewing:  Conducting telephonic interviews to evaluate skills, experience, and cultural fit.     Coordination:  Scheduling and coordinating interviews between candidates and hiring managers.     Information Provision:  Providing candidates with details about the company and job roles.     Reference Checks:  Verifying candidate references and conducting background checks.     Decision Making:  Collaborating with hiring managers to make informed hiring decisions.     Offer Negotiation:  Extending job offers and negotiating terms of employment with selected candidates.     Candidate Experience:  Ensuring a positive experience for candidates throughout the recruitment process.     Feedback:  Providing timely feedback to candidates on their application status.     Record Keeping:  Maintaining accurate records of all recruitment activities.     Compliance:  Ensuring compliance with relevant employment laws and regulations.     Strategy Development:  Collaborating with HR and hiring managers to develop and refine talent acquisition strategies.      Internship Details:        Timing:  9 AM to 6 PM     Age Requirement:  Above 18     Qualification:  Minimum pursuing graduation     Duration:  Minimum 3 months, maximum 6 months      Advantages of the Internship:        Hands-On Experience:  Learning through practical application.     Networking Opportunities:  Building connections within the industry.     Skill Development:  Enhancing various HR and recruitment skills.     Resume Enhancement:  Strengthening one's resume with relevant experience.     Exploration of Career Path:  Understanding the HR and recruitment career trajectory.     Feedback and Evaluation:  Receiving feedback for personal and professional growth.     Potential Job Offers:  Possibility of securing a job offer based on performance.     Personal Growth:  Developing personally through challenges and experiences.     Exposure to Industry Trends:  Staying updated with HR and recruitment trends.     Contributing to the Organization:  Making a meaningful contribution to the company's recruitment efforts.     Overall, this internship offers a comprehensive learning experience with the potential for personal and professional growth. Internship Programme at AideExpert Advisory          Internship opportunities are open for MBA students from colleges in and around Pune. To qualify for any internship, students should demonstrate strong curiosity and a keen ability to learn new skills fast. They should be self motivated and be able to ask engaging business questions. Interns who participate and learn as part of consulting projects need to have the confidence and be comfortable to engage with AideExpert customers. Long term and short term internship opportunities are available.                                             Short Term Internships          Short term opportunities for internships are available as part of market research teams. Students will learn to research on specific business problems and competitive analysis based using secondary research techniques. Short term internships are from 4 to 6 weeks in duration. Short term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Short term internships and are not paid.                                       Long Term Internships          Long Term opportunities for internships are available as part of consulting/advisory team and market research team. Students will learn lean startup and business process analysis skills as part of advisory projects. Long term internships are from 2 months to 6 months duration. Long term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Long term interns may need to travel to customer locations. Flexibility in office timing is available during college examinations and other college activities. A fixed stipend per month will be paid for selected interns.                      All Intern positions are immediate requirement and are based in Pune. Shortlisted students will be interviewed before being selected for internships by AideExpert Advisory team.                                       Stipend:  5000/                       Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization                       Functional Area:  Marketing, Research, Analytics, Technology                       Role Category : Marketing Research                       Keyskills : Secondary research, analysis, report writing, Market Research                                                         Responsibilities                       1.Working with Senior advisors to create company and product competitive analysis reports         2. Content writing for website- consulting/advisory services         3. Report writing for consulting projects         4. Learn to research on specific business problems using secondary research techniques         5. Opportunity to participate in consulting/advisory projects at customer site based on performance

Job Title:  Management Intern    Location:  Mumbai    Company Description:  ValueAxis Advisors is a full scale, multidisciplinary business consulting firm that provides tailor-made solutions specific to your business needs. Our team consists of Chartered Accountants having Big4 background, MBAs, Lawyers, Company Secretaries, Engineers and also very Senior Leaders from the corporate as well as consulting fraternity who are our mentors and empanelled advisors.    Position Overview:  We are seeking motivated and enthusiastic interns to join our team. This internship offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various facets of management consultancy, working alongside industry experts in a fast-paced and collaborative environment.    Key Responsibilities:     1)   Risk & Tax Advisory:       Assist in conducting risk assessments and developing risk mitigation strategies.    Support the team in providing tax advisory services, including tax planning and compliance.      2)   Business Structuring:       Participate in the analysis and development of optimal business structures for clients.    Assist in the preparation of business structuring reports and presentations.      3)   Fund Raising:       Conduct market research and analysis to identify potential funding sources.    Support the team in preparing pitch decks, financial models, and due diligence reports.      4)   IPO Advisory:       Assist in the IPO advisory process, including preparation of Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) and compliance documentation.    Conduct research on regulatory requirements and industry best practices.      5)   CFO Services:       Support the CFO Services team in financial planning, budgeting, and analysis.    Assist in the preparation of financial statements and management reports.      6)   Mergers & Acquisitions:       Participate in market research and analysis for potential M&A opportunities.    Assist in due diligence, valuation, and preparation of transaction documents.      Qualifications:    · Currently pursuing or Completed a degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field.   · Basic understanding of financial statements and accounting principles.   · Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.   · Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).   · Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.   · Ability to work independently and as part of a team.    Benefits:    · Mentorship from experienced professionals in the industry.   · Opportunity to work on real client projects and gain practical insights.   · Dynamic and supportive work environment   · Networking opportunities and professional development. Job Description: High-Ticket Sales Specialist     Position Overview:    We are seeking an experienced and dynamic High-Ticket Sales Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying, targeting, and closing high-value clients for our design and development services. This role is crucial in driving revenue growth and expanding our market presence, particularly among early-stage startup founders in the USA, Canada, and Europe. Additionally, if the candidate can help secure investments for startups, it will be a significant advantage. Networking skills and a strong understanding of the startup ecosystem are essential for success in this role.    Key Responsibilities:       Identify and target early-stage startup founders in the USA, Canada, and Europe.    Engage with potential clients to understand their needs and present our design and development services.    Close high-ticket sales deals to meet and exceed revenue targets.    Build and maintain a robust network of startup founders, investors, and industry influencers.    Assist startups in identifying potential investors and facilitating investment opportunities.    Leverage existing networks to connect startups with venture capitalists and angel investors.    Develop and implement effective sales strategies to attract high-value clients.    Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts, tracking progress against targets.    Provide insights and feedback to improve service offerings and sales approaches.      Requirements:       Demonstrated ability to network effectively and build lasting professional relationships.    Excellent communication and presentation skills.    Strong negotiation and closing abilities.    Ability to work independently and as part of a team.    Strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.    Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred but not mandatory). Internship Programme at AideExpert Advisory          Internship opportunities are open for MBA students from colleges in and around Pune. To qualify for any internship, students should demonstrate strong curiosity and a keen ability to learn new skills fast. They should be self motivated and be able to ask engaging business questions. Interns who participate and learn as part of consulting projects need to have the confidence and be comfortable to engage with AideExpert customers. Long term and short term internship opportunities are available.                                             Short Term Internships          Short term opportunities for internships are available as part of market research teams. Students will learn to research on specific business problems and competitive analysis based using secondary research techniques. Short term internships are from 4 to 6 weeks in duration. Short term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Short term internships and are not paid.                                       Long Term Internships          Long Term opportunities for internships are available as part of consulting/advisory team and market research team. Students will learn lean startup and business process analysis skills as part of advisory projects. Long term internships are from 2 months to 6 months duration. Long term interns need to work for at least 20 hours per week. Long term interns may need to travel to customer locations. Flexibility in office timing is available during college examinations and other college activities. A fixed stipend per month will be paid for selected interns.                      All Intern positions are immediate requirement and are based in Pune. Shortlisted students will be interviewed before being selected for internships by AideExpert Advisory team.                                       Stipend:  5000/                       Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization                       Functional Area:  Marketing, Research, Analytics, Technology                       Role Category : Marketing Research                       Keyskills : Secondary research, analysis, report writing, Market Research                                                         Responsibilities                       1.Working with Senior advisors to create company and product competitive analysis reports         2. Content writing for website- consulting/advisory services         3. Report writing for consulting projects         4. Learn to research on specific business problems using secondary research techniques         5. Opportunity to participate in consulting/advisory projects at customer site based on performance

Job description  As a Lead Generation and Telecaller Sales Intern, you will play a crucial role in identifying potential clients and driving the initial stages of our sales process. Job Description                                 Additional Information                       About ATS      ATS is an industry-leading automation solutions provider to many of the world’s most successful companies. ATS uses its extensive knowledge base and global capabilities in custom automation, repeat automation, automation products and value-added services, including pre-automation and after-sales services, to address the sophisticated manufacturing automation systems and service needs of multinational customers in markets such as life sciences, food & beverage, transportation, consumer products, and energy. VenueMonk is a technology-enabled event planning service. Presently, in India, finding and booking a venue for any event is a rather exaggerated process. A typical venue booking timeline lasts 3 to 15 days. It starts with an online search and is followed by calls to different venues, explaining your requirements to them, visiting them, negotiating with them, and would end with you booking your short-listed venue. Our aim is to fill in the obvious gap in the events industry, that is, finding information in one place and the ease of booking services at the best prices. You can explore over a thousand listed venues and vendors for planning your event. Not only do we provide detailed, comprehensive, and current information about the venues and vendors, we also help you book these services at the best price in a hassle-free way with just a click or a call. We are currently working with 1800+ venues across Delhi-NCR. Company Description       What   is   Lokal   Lokal - India's largest hyperlocal platform in Indian languages is focussed on building a world-class product for non-english speakers in India by providing them local information, classifieds and evolving with more meaningful use cases every day. We are operational in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka, Maharashtra, Gujarat, Punjab and West Bengal with 45M+ downloads as of today.        Our   Vision   One platform for all of regional India's needs.        Our   story   Lokal(Behtar Technology Private Limited), headquartered in Bengaluru was founded by IIT Alumni, Jani Pasha and Vipul Chaudhary in the year 2018 to build Web 2.0 for tier 2 & tier 3 cities in India. Having achieved unmatched user density in deep tier 2 & 3 locations in India, Lokal has raised Rs 120 crore in a Series B funding round from new investors Global Brain and Sony Innovation Fund and is also been supported by marquee investors, namely 3 one 4 Capital, India Quotient, Y Combinator.        We are being heard : Tech Crunch, Forbes, Economic Times    Job Description       About   the   Role   We are in a really exciting phase of growth and want bright and passionate problem solvers and first principle thinkers to come join us in our recently initiated Strategy & Ops (Founders' Office) team to deeply understand the challenges of the user and convert these into meaningful solutions. In this role you will work on priority problem statements specifically focused on revenue, growth, and overall business strategy. This role is for generalists who are open to wearing multiple hats across the workplace and work in a challenging fast-paced environment  along with the founders / other senior management. The role will be ideal for people contemplating further studies such as an MBA or looking to start up at that point in their career,  or also move into a specific function within the company itself.        Key   Responsibilities   Working directly with the Founders and Functional Leaders in driving key strategic priorities for the Founders' Office - will entail owning key problem statements / projects across various functions like strategy, business operations, monetisation and profitability, 0 to 1 initiatives, etc. while working with teams to drive them to execution. Specific examples - Strategy for improving an existing revenue stream or building a new one, GTM strategy for new district / initiative,business planning, etc.  Manage or work with entire team across functions such as classifieds, product, content, brand sales, and marketing to deep dive into problems for the business, derive business insights, and inform execution planning  Identify and prioritise medium-long term projects that can deliver non-linear growth in scale of business and / or revenues        Skills   Needed   We are looking for a young, high-energy and driven professional who is ready to dive into a hyper-growth start-up and contribute towards the next 10x growth journey in the Next Billion Users (NBU) space of Consumer-Tech. More specifically:  Great problem solving and analytical skills - Ability to breakdown complex problems into smaller pieces and layout clear game plans to solve and execute  Comfort with ambiguity - Ability to work on ambiguous problem statements / ambiguous environments and lead the way to structure and define a clear path for execution  High sense of ownership and initiative - Strong ability to drive execution while having high ownership for owned mandates and furthermore, ability to identify problems / opportunities and take initiative to drive them towards impact  Strong stakeholder & team management skills - Ability to manage stakeholders across levels and teams to deliver on tight execution plans  Excellent written and verbal communication skills - You will set the agenda in critical meetings and will need to drive action effectively    Qualifications      MBA / Undergraduate degree from a top-tier college  6 months to 1 year relevant FTE/internship experience across top strategy consulting firms and / or tech companies in business strategy and ops roles           Bonus points if you have had exposure to:   6 months to 1 year of experience at a fast paced start up  Managing large scale strategic / transformation projects in your prior role  Roles at the intersection of business, product (consumer / media), and tech  Driving both strategic and tactical decision making    Additional Information       What   you   will   get   unique   at   Lokal   Expected to shape the future of the company, provide inputs on what to change in the business strategy, and be ready to lead the change from the front

The role of a social media intern is to create, execute and manage social media marketing campaigns and strategies that promote a company’s brand, increase its online presence, and drive engagement and conversions.      Here are some of the key roles and responsibilities of a social media intern:       Strategy Development:  The primary responsibility of a social media intern is to develop a social media strategy that aligns with the company’s overall marketing and branding goals. This includes identifying target audiences, selecting social media channels, and creating a content plan.       Content Creation:  Social media interns are responsible for creating engaging and shareable content for social media channels, including images, videos, and written posts.       Community Management:  Social media interns engage with and respond to followers and comments on social media channels, fostering a positive community and addressing concerns or complaints.       Analytics and Reporting:  Social media interns analyse metrics on social media, such as engagement rates, follower growth, and conversion rates, and use this data to optimise their social media strategy and report on performance to management.       Collaboration:  Social media interns work closely with other members of the marketing and creative teams, such as designers and content writers, to ensure that social media content aligns with the company’s overall branding and messaging.       Paid Social Advertising:  Social media interns create and manage paid social media advertising campaigns, select target audiences and ad formats, and monitor and optimise campaign performance.       Staying Up to Date:  Social media interns must stay up-to-date with social media trends, best practices, and changes to algorithms and policies and adjust their strategy accordingly.      Overall, a Social Media intern is responsible for creating and executing a social media strategy that promotes the company’s brand, increases its online presence, and drives engagement and conversions. They work collaboratively with other members of the marketing and creative teams, analyse social media metrics to optimise their strategy, and stay up-to-date with social media trends and changes.       Requirements of a Social Media Intern:            Bachelor’s degree (Domain-specific courses would be an addition to the role)       Proven Work Experience with Social Media (preferably 0-6 Months)       Willing to work from the office (5 days a week)       Fluency in the English Language is mandatory.       Adaptability and creativity with respect to the latest Social Media Trends.            Internship Duration –  3 Months                                  Job Category:  Head of Client Services                    Job Type:  Full Time                    Job Location:  Bangalore

Job Description          Skill Requirement                                  Background         Praan (Praan, Inc.) is an impact focused deep-tech startup democratising clean air using breakthrough filterless technology. The company is backed by top tier VCs and CXOs globally and currently operates between the United States and India. Our team puts extreme attention to detail and loves building technology that's aspirational. Praan's team and culture is positioned to empower people to solve large global problems at an accelerated pace.         Why         Everyone worries about the dooms-day in climate change which is expected to occur in the 2050s. However, there's one doom's day which is the reality for millions of people around the world today. Air pollution takes more than 7 Million lives globally every single year. Over 5% of premature children death occur due to air pollution in developing countries. Everyone has relied on governments or experts to solve the problem, but most solutions up until today have either been too expensive or too ineffective. Praan is an attempt at making the future cleaner, healthier, and safer for the generations to come.          Job Description                Build and maintain B2B and B2G Partnerships in Architecture, Real-estate, Hospitals, International-Properties, and Industries.         Educate customers on Praan and its competitive advantages.         Find avenues for future deployments such as Praan’s SaaS products, and products under development with the special projects group.         Interact with design, software, and communication teams to ensure that we build exactly the product and the service.         Carry out financial analysis and modeling of different products and services for decision making.         Work on Market Size Estimation.         Presentation & Submission of proposals to Institutional Potential Buyers.         Develop slide decks for various stakeholders.         Developing positioning & communication strategy, driving media/PR strategy & execution with focus on online/offline ROI focused marketing, partnerships & full-funnel thinking/approach.         Consumer, Category & Owner insights along with market/landscape scoping & marketing research/analytics.         Building & motivating high-caliber teams & cross-functional collaboration including end-to-end project management.         Business planning & forecasting to drive top line along with contribution margin and profit accountability.         Collaboration with global teams & local/international clients.         Be involved in company communication strategy.                         Skill Requirements                Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience in marketing/ institutional sales.         Strong understanding of the market.         Ability to build financial models for the company.         Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.         Customer service attitude with excellent negotiation skills.         Excellent analytical skills and problem solving skills.         Proficiency in MS Powerpoint/Keynote, MS Word.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills.         Ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations /teams.         High energy, optimistic candidate.  Strong abilities to work independently.              Good to Have                Past experience working in a deep-tech hardware startups.         past experience working in the core R&D and manufacturing teams.         Passionate about working with new techniques, materials, chemicals to build cutting-edge technologies.                      Praan is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on race, religion, caste, gender, disability or any other criteria. We just care about working with great human beings!

Eagerness to learn, adapt, and contribute to a dynamic and growing Startup. Job Description: JD for SOC Analyst:     What is a SOC analyst?    SOC analysts can be understood as the first point of contact to any incident/threat in basic terms. SOC stands for Security Operations Center, and it consists of multiple analysts who work 24x7 rotational shifts to fight against threats that could harm an organization. A SOC analyst generally is responsible for assessing the endpoints and look for vulnerabilities using various tools and technologies. However, the role of a SOC analyst is not limited to this:    SOC Analyst Job Duties and Responsibilities    Evaluate critical security incidents using detection tools. Investigate event alerts and logs from multiple endpoints. Analyze and co-relate logs from the firewall, IDS/IPS, AVs, O365, etc. Work in a 24x7 pro-active environment and respond to security alerts. Document and report incidents/offenses to the clients. Use Endpoint detection tools to detect malware across the client’s environment. Maintain and send monthly, weekly reports and other client-specific documentation. Work on industry standard SIEM solutions to analyze incidents and create complex indexed searches. Using analytical skills to whitelist False Positives incidents. Keep yourself updated on security news/vulnerabilities and compose a set of Use Cases. Use basic scripting knowledge to automate processes. Onboarding new clients from scratch and configuring their network environment. Identifying compromised Endpoints by analyzing payloads/logs and notifying clients. Work on latest security technologies, including Email filtering, Compliance and Patch management, Syslog management, MDR, and SIEM.    The internship's total duration will be six months. The candidate will be trained in Cybersecurity Operations by SafeAeon and will be paid a monthly stipend of INR 18,000/month. Upon completing the training, the trainees will be offered a TIER-1 SOC (Analyst) position in a company .   Interested candidates can share CV on ** shabnam@safeaeon.com **. About Aliens     Aliens Tattoo is a high-energy, vibrant, privately held organization with a whopping 500 million INR valuation, bringing premium tattoo art and body modification services to folks across India. As one of the fastestgrowing chains of tattoo studios in the world, we strive to deliver an unforgettable tattooing experience to all our customers. Our Mumbai headquarters is home to a squad of 160+ team players from marketing, sales, support, customer delight, HR, IT, operations, finance, and beyond.   At Aliens Tattoo, our secret sauce is our unique work culture that is all about openness, transparency, creativity, and fun. We're also pretty big on integrity and pushing for personal growth and development. We believe in continuous learning, owning up to successes and failures, and making a positive impact on the community around us. Join our team, and you'll see for yourself why Aliens Tattoo is more than just a company - it's a way of life.    Mission    As a Social Media Marketing Intern, you'll dive into the world of digital marketing, contributing to various aspects of our social media presence, SEO strategies, and content distribution. You'll play a pivotal role in engaging our community, amplifying our brand voice, and supporting our marketing initiatives. SEO and Content Distribution:  Assist with backlink acquisition, directory submissions, and SEO-related content submissions to enhance our online visibility.         Administrative Support:       Help manage digital assets and perform other marketing-related administrative tasks. A passion for social media and digital marketing, with an eagerness to learn and grow.        Basic knowledge of graphic design, video editing, and content creation tools is a plus.        Familiarity with social media analytics and SEO best practices.        Excellent communication skills and a flair for creative thinking.        Organizational skills with attention to detail. VenueMonk is a technology-enabled event planning service. Presently, in India, finding and booking a venue for any event is a rather exaggerated process. A typical venue booking timeline lasts 3 to 15 days. It starts with an online search and is followed by calls to different venues, explaining your requirements to them, visiting them, negotiating with them, and would end with you booking your short-listed venue. Our aim is to fill in the obvious gap in the events industry, that is, finding information in one place and the ease of booking services at the best prices. You can explore over a thousand listed venues and vendors for planning your event. Not only do we provide detailed, comprehensive, and current information about the venues and vendors, we also help you book these services at the best price in a hassle-free way with just a click or a call. We are currently working with 1800+ venues across Delhi-NCR. The role of a social media intern is to create, execute and manage social media marketing campaigns and strategies that promote a company’s brand, increase its online presence, and drive engagement and conversions.      Here are some of the key roles and responsibilities of a social media intern:       Strategy Development:  The primary responsibility of a social media intern is to develop a social media strategy that aligns with the company’s overall marketing and branding goals. This includes identifying target audiences, selecting social media channels, and creating a content plan.       Content Creation:  Social media interns are responsible for creating engaging and shareable content for social media channels, including images, videos, and written posts.       Community Management:  Social media interns engage with and respond to followers and comments on social media channels, fostering a positive community and addressing concerns or complaints.       Analytics and Reporting:  Social media interns analyse metrics on social media, such as engagement rates, follower growth, and conversion rates, and use this data to optimise their social media strategy and report on performance to management.       Collaboration:  Social media interns work closely with other members of the marketing and creative teams, such as designers and content writers, to ensure that social media content aligns with the company’s overall branding and messaging.       Paid Social Advertising:  Social media interns create and manage paid social media advertising campaigns, select target audiences and ad formats, and monitor and optimise campaign performance.       Staying Up to Date:  Social media interns must stay up-to-date with social media trends, best practices, and changes to algorithms and policies and adjust their strategy accordingly.      Overall, a Social Media intern is responsible for creating and executing a social media strategy that promotes the company’s brand, increases its online presence, and drives engagement and conversions. They work collaboratively with other members of the marketing and creative teams, analyse social media metrics to optimise their strategy, and stay up-to-date with social media trends and changes.       Requirements of a Social Media Intern:            Bachelor’s degree (Domain-specific courses would be an addition to the role)       Proven Work Experience with Social Media (preferably 0-6 Months)       Willing to work from the office (5 days a week)       Fluency in the English Language is mandatory.       Adaptability and creativity with respect to the latest Social Media Trends.            Internship Duration –  3 Months                                  Job Category:  Head of Client Services                    Job Type:  Full Time                    Job Location:  Bangalore

Job Description:                    We are looking to employ an enthusiastic and driven HR intern to assist our HR department with administrative and HR-related tasks. The HR intern’s responsibilities include updating employee absence records, filing HR documents accordingly, initiating background checks on shortlisted candidates, and providing suitable recommendations to improve HR policies. You should also be able to draft employee communications notifying staff of policy and procedural changes.       To be successful as an HR intern, you should keep abreast of the latest developments in labour legislation to determine how company HR policies may be affected. Ultimately, an outstanding HR intern should be detail-oriented and able to demonstrate excellent administrative and organizational skills.        HR Intern Responsibilities:              Updating company databases by inputting new employee contact information and employment details.        Screening potential employees’ resumes and application forms to identify suitable candidates to fill company job vacancies.        Organizing interviews with shortlisted candidates.        Posting job advertisements to job boards and social media platforms.        Removing job advertisements from job boards and social media platforms once vacancies have been filled. About OpeninApp    We are a lab building products for the creator economy. Why so, because we are on a mission to empower the individual to realize/unleash their full potential.    OpeninApp    Almost all your favourite creators on Instagram share links to their latest YouTube videos or YouTube channels in their bio or stories. But whenever you tap on those links, you get redirected to the YouTube website instead of the YouTube app. And here you can’t watch the video in full screen nor can you like it, comment on it or subscribe to the channel. Ever wondered why it is so? That’s because Instagram has something called a Built-In-Browser that opens up instead of opening the app you wanted to open. Which is not cool at all….And this is not just so for IG but for all your favourite social media apps eg. YouTube, LinkedIn, Twitter, Snapchat, Telegram, Quora etc. So we fixed this problem of sub-optimal user experiences by building a tool that ensures all social media links open in the apps they should. It’s called OpeninApp. And it is already been loved by over 1.9 Million influencers & brands including the likes of Bhuvan Bam, Flying Beat, Anubhav Dubey (Chai Sutta Bar), Ritesh Agarwal (OYO), Riva Arora, Boat, Mamaearth etc.    Who Should apply?    The ideal candidate will possess a keen understanding of sales principles, coupled with exceptional communication skills, and a passion for driving business success.    Job Description    As an Entrepreneur in Residence (EIR) Intern, you will immerse yourself in a dynamic and high-impact role, providing support and contributing to the strategic growth and development initiatives of our organization. This position is designed to foster your entrepreneurial spirit and business acumen, preparing you for future leadership roles in the startup ecosystem.    Key Responsibilities    1. Market Research and Analysis: - Conduct comprehensive market research to identify emerging trends, market needs, and competitive landscape. - Analyze data to support the development of business strategies and innovative solutions.   2. Business Plan Development: - Assist in creating detailed business plans, including market entry strategies, revenue models, and financial projections. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to refine business concepts and align them with organizational goals.   3. Strategic Initiatives: - Participate in strategic planning sessions to identify growth opportunities and potential partnerships. - Support the EIR in evaluating and prioritizing new business ventures and strategic investments.   4. Project Management: - Manage and track the progress of various entrepreneurial projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards. - Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to facilitate project execution.   5. Innovation and Ideation: - Contribute to brainstorming sessions to generate innovative ideas and business solutions. - Conduct feasibility studies to assess the viability of proposed business concepts.   6. Financial Analysis and Modeling: - Perform financial analysis and modeling to evaluate the financial health and potential of new ventures. - Prepare detailed reports and presentations to communicate findings to senior management.   7. Networking and Relationship Building: - Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including investors, industry experts, and potential partners. - Represent the organization at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities.   8. Operational Support: - Provide operational support to the EIR in managing day-to-day activities and administrative tasks. - Assist in the preparation of documents, presentations, and reports for internal and external use.    Why work with us?    We understand and respect the entrepreneurial spirit inside you which means you get absolute freedom to be your own boss.    What's the company Culture like?    Extremely passionate. We’re only looking for people who want to prove to the world how gifted they are or who really really want to truly democratize access to capital.This is not a job, it’s a mission. About OML:     &nbsp;    Only Much Louder Entertainment is a market-leading, full-service creative and entertainment business network that has instigated pop culture for over two decades by creating iconic moments across television, digital content, fan experiences, branded entertainment and in the artist-creators community. Celebrated for creating India's first multi-genre music festival, the NH7 Weekender, Only Much Louder has built India’s independent music and comedy scene from the ground-up. They won the first-ever Branded Content and Entertainment Cannes Lion for ‘Dewarists’ and have been the first homegrown content business to have a strong footprint in over 22 countries.   Today, Only Much Louder businesses include :-    Artist Management:  Representing the best talent in the country including comedians, actors, chefs, hosts, writers, directors, creators, illusionists, &nbsp;and more.    Content Studio:  Developing and producing original long-form scripted and unscripted content for television and streaming platforms since 2016 with over 32 shows and 69 comedy specials, across Amazon Prime, Netflix, MTV, Disney Hotstar and more.    Branded Content:  With businesses in the creative and branded content space Only Much Louder &nbsp;has serviced some of the biggest global brands like Tinder, Netflix, OPPO India, Amazon, Tira Beauty, &nbsp;Canva India and more.       1862:  A groundbreaking branded content and influencer marketing agency with active campaigns in 22 countries and teams in Russia, Poland, Nigeria and Japan.     GCN:  The full-service strategic and creative agency at the intersection of advertising, branded content, communication design and social media.      Hypothesis:&nbsp; Over two decades of working with agencies, brands and influencers has helped us identify gaps and challenges in influencer marketing, resulting in Hypothesis, a comprehensive AI-enabled influencer marketing platform that services the entire influencer marketing journey and has executed more than 150 campaigns.   About the Role:   We're on the lookout for creative individuals who are bursting with creativity! If you're a visionary with a knack for crafting campaigns and driving positive change through visual content and communications, then buckle up because this opportunity is tailor-made for you!   Key responsibilities:   1. Embark on a journey through the digital and social landscapes of India, stay ahead of the curve on local trends.   2. Navigate the creator landscape with finesse, forging connections and building relationships that will set your campaigns apart.   3. Master the art of negotiation as you work your magic with vendors and content creators, ensuring maximum impact while minimizing costs.   4. Unleash your creativity with your pitch-perfect decks and maintain reports that will leave your clients in awe.   5. Dive deep into data analysis, extracting insights and weaving them into the fabric of our ongoing campaigns for maximum impact.   6. Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams, rallying designers, copywriters, and creators alike to bring our visions to life.   7. Seize the opportunity on social media campaigns under the expert guidance of our leads, bringing your unique flair to every project.   8. Transform client requirements into innovative solutions that defy expectations and push boundaries.   9. Keep your finger on the pulse of what's trending, infusing your work with the latest and greatest to ensure it stands out from the crowd.   Skills:   1. A deep understanding of India's digital content landscape and the creators who call it home.   2. Powerful written and verbal communication skills that captivate and inspire.   3. Interest in the realm of influencers and content creators, with a track record of success that speaks for itself.   4. A knack for research and forming opinions supported with data.&nbsp;   5. Masterful time management skills and the ability to juggle multiple hats without breaking a sweat and the ability to effortlessly navigate requests between brands   6. A basic understanding of video production that will add an extra layer of magic to your work.&nbsp;   7. Background in Media, Advertising, Content Writing, Production, Film Making, Talent and an equivalent Bachelors/ Masters Degree.&nbsp;   If you're ready to embark on an exhilarating journey filled with creativity, innovation, and endless possibilities, then we want to hear from you! Join us as we redefine the future of branded content, advertising, and influencer marketing one groundbreaking campaign at a time.   Our values:   1. We build opportunities for our artists, brands and fans; and it’s important for us to be reliable and efficient&nbsp;   2. We demonstrate honesty, excellence and commitment to success&nbsp;   3. ‘It’s not my job’ is not part of our vocabulary, we even stuff envelopes&nbsp;   4. We make mistakes, but only to learn from them to build resilience&nbsp;   5. We take care of ourselves and our colleagues&nbsp;   6. We are our own managers&nbsp;   7. We are committed to equality and inclusion&nbsp;   8. We are mindful of the strain on the Earth's resources and are committed to reversing the trend with our behaviors where possible&nbsp;   Aside from the fact that you can chance upon your favorite comedians, bump into our furry friends while you grab a cup of coffee and get inside access to some of the coolest festivals in the country;   We ensure all our team members get enough down-time:&nbsp;We have monthly mandatory offs. We don't have a punch-in punch-out culture.   We are ready to level up everyday:&nbsp;You bring the passion, we deliver the (countless) opportunities.   We ensure everyone in the OML fam is taken care of:&nbsp;We offer free mental health care for all team members, we have gender neutral POSH & Parental leave policies, and our insurance policies extend to your in-laws as well!   We have fun while we're at it:&nbsp;Game Nights, FRI-YAYs, KnOML and much more!   We recognize talent:&nbsp;You bring the passion, we deliver the (countless) opportunities.   Thank you!   Thank you for taking the time to go through the opportunity we have to offer. &nbsp;   If you apply, please do not share your photo, age, gender, religion or ethnicity in your resume. You do not even need to share your last name. &nbsp;(We want to eliminate biases on any of these parameters while we decide on our shortlisted candidates)   We will get in touch with you if your profile gets shortlisted.
